title: Using interceptors in RestTemplate to modify the request
description: Modify requests of RestTemplate by adjusting the request, e.g., by the auth header and custom headers.
author: Simon Scholz

children.value: Interceptors in Spring's RestTemplate allow you to intercept and modify HTTP requests and responses sent and received by your application. They are useful for tasks like authentication, logging, adding headers, or customizing requests before they are sent to a remote server.
